attributes.action: Award a Knighthood to Richard Todd
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Mr Richard Todd has been one of our finest actors on Stage,Television and Films for over 50 years. 
In World War 2 Mr Todd was one of the First Paratroopers to Parachute in to Normandy on D Day. 
He saw action around the canal bridge which is now known as Pegasus Bridge. 
Given his distinguished war time service and his subsequent illustrious career since.I therefore ask this Goverment to honour him with a knighthood.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
